name: FROOT META ALCHEMY
description: Froot Meta Alchemy is a 2.5D casual arcade mobile game that aims to be an addictive and fun experience. As a well known alchemist that is famous for root-based potions, you're trying to meet the demand by making potions on the spot for the happy-to-pay adventurers. Gameplay is focused on cutting the correct ingredients for potion recipes in a limited time window to make gold.
